citations.narrative:
Item Housekeeping 3.31 b
At the time of inspection it was noticed that the back door frame was beginning to rust and corrode. This is not
maintaining the facility in good repair.
Facility needs to repair the back door frame so as to insure the facility is in good repair
Correct by 12/15/14

Item Sanitation 3.131 b
At the time of inspection it was noticed that the sugar glider cage was beginning to rust. Cages that rusty cannot be
properly sanitized.
Facility needs to replace the rusty cage so as to insure the cage can be properly sanitized
Correct by 11/6/14
Exit interview conducted at the end of inspection
